content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --TERM
      operator: equal_to
      value: OTHER
Core:
  Id: CORE-000161
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise an error when --TERM = 'OTHER'
Outcome:
  Message: --TERM is equal to 'OTHER'
  Output Variables:
    - --TERM
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0343
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: 'Events: "Other, Specify" for Events may be handled
                  similarly to Interventions. --TERM should be populated with the
                  description of the event found in the specified text and --PRESP
                  could be used to distinguish between prespecified and free text
                  responses.'
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 4.2.7.3
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Events: "Other, Specify" for Events may be handled similarly to Interventions. --TERM should be populated with the description of the event found in the specified text and --PRESP could be used to distinguish between prespecified and free text responses.
